meaningMnemonic: I have the <kanji>nature</kanji> of being <kanji>resistant</kanji> for a <kanji>long time</kanji>. Things that are resistant for a long time have good <vocabulary>durability</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
